text: Hollicar Creek is a stream in the U.S. state of Mississippi. It is a tributary to Shubuta Creek. Hollicar is a name derived from the Choctaw language purported to mean "a sacred thing". Variant transliterations are "Hellicon Creek", "Hollicker Creek", and "Hullicar Creek". ==References== Category:Rivers of Mississippi Category:Bodies of water of Clarke County, Mississippi Category:Bodies of water of Jasper County, Mississippi
title: Hollicar Creek
